name: zdk
description: ZDK is the official frontend kit to get you started building dApps with the Zoo Protocol.
author: Lux Protocol

scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude primitives --exclude ssr-testing run clean
scripts.build: yarn build:config && yarn build:packages && yarn build:cleanup
scripts.build:cleanup: mv tsconfig.json tsconfig.production.json && mv tsconfig.tmp.json tsconfig.json
scripts.publish:stable: yarn bump:stable && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach --no-private --exclude zdk --exclude demo npm publish --tolerate-republish --access public
scripts.changelog: yarn workspaces foreach --no-private --exclude zdk --exclude demo run changelog && git add -A; git commit -m 'changelog: update changelog'
